sentences.en: Adolescence is the transition period between childhood and manhood.
sentences.cn: 青春期是儿童和成人阶段的过渡时期.

sentences.en: An increasing number of states granted white manhood suffrage during his administration.
sentences.cn: 在他当政期间,保证白人成年公民选举权的州越来越多.

sentences.en: Flora Manhood had never taken part in a mystery.
sentences.cn: 弗洛拉·曼胡德从未介入过任何秘密勾当.

sentences.en: He had much money to play with in his manhood.
sentences.cn: 他成年时有许多钱供他挥霍.

sentences.en: Her new-found power was a threat to his manhood.
sentences.cn: 她最近具有的能力对他的男子汉气概是个威胁。

sentences.en: His handwriting, from earliest young manhood, was flowing and graceful.
sentences.cn: 他的字从小就写得流畅优美。

sentences.en: His son has grown into manhood.
Just how much she had heard, Sister Manhood wondered.
sentences.cn: 曼胡德护士心中纳闷,她到底听说过多少呢?

sentences.en: Sister Manhood was glad to find it coming so easy.
sentences.cn: 曼胡德护士十分高兴自己出口这样顺当.

sentences.en: The idea grew with him as he grew into manhood.
sentences.cn: 随着他长大成人,这个念头也逐渐成熟了.

sentences.en: Their leader told them to prove their manhood by fighting well.
sentences.cn: 他们的首领要他们奋勇作战,以此显示男子汉气概.

sentences.en: They were failing lamentably to help their sons grow from boyhood to manhood.
sentences.cn: 他们抱憾未能帮助儿子们顺利地长大成人。

sentences.en: Those killed have been described as the flower of Polish manhood.
sentences.cn: 那些牺牲者被称为波兰男子中的精英。

sentences.en: When a boy reaches manhood, he should behave like a man.
sentences.cn: 男孩成年后其行为应象个男子汉.

sentences.en: Why did he feel he had to prove his manhood in the company of women?
sentences.cn: 他为什么觉得必须在女人面前证明他的男子气概呢？

words.tran_cn: 勇敢的；果断的；有男子气概的
无人的；没有男子的；卑鄙的；残忍的
有男子气概的，像男人的；像人的（形容动物）
男子气概的；强壮的；适于男人的
操纵；给…配置人员；使增强勇气；在…就位

trans.tran_cn: 成年，男子，男子气概，刚毅之气
trans.tran_en: qualities such as strength, courage, and sexual power, that people think a man should have
